bandaranayaka aanduwa ‘sinhala pamanayi‘ panatha gena awasthawe eeta wirodhaya pamin golpes pitiye pawathi demala sathyagrahayata pahara di eeta sahabhagi wu uthure parlimenthu manthriwarun denneku wu naganadan saha nawarathnamwa ussa bere wawata wisi kirimata tharam rajarathnage marayo eda sahasika wuha.

oba bara kirima ho hara thibeda sadhaka dekak matha randa pawathi: oba dirgha ho keti thaththwaya pawathwamin sitina yanna 1); ha 2) oba ganudenu dedena di mudal warga dekak athara poli anupatha aanthara.

in anathuruwa, (a) deshapalana paksha gananawaka lekamwaru mathiwaranayata tharaga kirime siya abhilashaya pala kalaha., (aa) piligath deshapalana paksha saha swadhina kandayam gananawak parlimenthu mathiwarana panathe 15 wani chedaya pa්rakara parlimenthuwata thera pathwimata adahas karana apekshakayange nam athulath nama yojana patha්ra idiripath kalaha, (aa) parlimenthu mathiwarana panathe 16 saha 17 cheda pa්rakara niyamitha paridi apa mudal thanpath karana ladi.
danaya ohuge aadayam margaya wana athara katha magin pindima ohuge nishpadanayayi.
